description: Open Source, Encrypted, Fast, can't beat it.
summary: Best note taking app there is

description:
Excellent app. Best thing is it is available across the platforms so it is easy to sync whether you are working on linux, android, mac or windows. Keep up the good work !!
Just need to add options to add following to be credible alternative for current Note taking Apps:
1. Images / Videos
2. Links
3. Audio Notes

Thanks. Hope team will add that.
summary: Great App. Would love to recommend !

description: Stable and clean. no crashes. Standard notes are known for stability and encryption. i like it.
This application is most comfortable. Support all platforms and easy for use. 4 stars because all features only in extended version.
Open Source, Encrypted, Cross Platform, Easy to Use! Support the development if you can
Great note taking app. Perhaps a few more basic features could make its way to the free version, but I get this business model.

I like the overall premise of this app and I can understand the business plan but the free version is way too basic to be worth it in my opinion. It is a plain editor with no rich editing options like headers, lists etc...
summary: Secure, fast and cross-platform but way too basic

description: One of the apps that worked flawlessly for me both on my ubuntu laptop at home and macbook at work. Love it!
If you need an encrypted note taking app that runs on multiple platforms, this is it.
summary: Very young software, has a long way to go, but the basics are there

description: all the features that made me install this turned out to be pro only , EVEN the dark theme
summary: free version is just too limited

description: The pro version demo is fantastic. However the free version is a plain text editor. No rich editing at all. Lack of lists, heading and bullets makes it very inconvenient.

Currently I only use the free version, but there are enough features available to make it the perfect tool for what I need. If you do want/need more features, the paid plan is decently priced and has a five year option.
It is perfecly customizable and user friendly
For me Standard Notes is a must have app. It works great, with just the right features I need. It's also great to be to access my notes on my phone as well.
Privacy first, feature rich, and does one thing super well. It'd be amazing to have just a couple more features like inter-note linking, but it's already fantastic.
Best app ever. Fast, open source, very private. What else could you want?
Is encrypted, syncs quickly, has a very nice consistent experience between platforms, and isn't bloated at all. 10/10
is there any way to sort the list by drag and drop ?
-1 for Slow Load (first load). Developers, Please think about this.
seemless sync across devices and high security and privacy standards
Joplin has no pay version, has cross-platform versions, lets you use any cloud storage service for syncing. Looks very much like this program. Check it out.
This is so satisfactory

Open-source, simple, extensible and with a proper business model ensuring its longevity. Happy to subscribe for the extra features and contribute to its long-term development. I don't understand the other reviewers' stance of revoking stars for paid features. Support your fellow open-source dev!
working good but not more attractive
summary: working good but not more attractive

description:
As a basic editor it's not bad - but to get any functionality out of it, you have to pay $9.99 a month is the most expensive, but works out cheaper on a 5 year plan.

Stay true to FOSS and make it free.
summary: Looks OK - But charges a fortune for extras

description: Works fine. Sync with other devices.

VERY easy to use. Can be installed on my android phone. Automatically syncs any data. FREE

Perfect!
yeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeah
I am currently using 20.04 of ubuntu But i Cant open It.
summary: I am currently using 20.04 of ubuntu But i Cant open It

description: Very good app if you ever dreamed of a software with encrypted sync between your linux and iphone
It is perfectly reasonable to not want an untrusted app to have access to the user's home directory. Please fix this.
summary: Doesn't start when removing home directory permission

description: I think They should give us more Features in free version.
I just recovered my computer from a self inflicted crash. Nice to see all my notes waiting here for me when I got back up and running. Five stars for that.
fast, encrypted, overall useful app
Good organization and security options.
Easy to keep notes
Would love a Sailfish OS app btw
I love this app. Very simple
Free E2E. Paid version gives so many features. They are all worth it. It has been since 1 year and I have never looked back.
summary: Clean interface, syncs, pro version is amazing

description: Been using for the past year, never had a problem with the free mode. Allways stable and simple to use.
Hi it won't launch after the 3.4.6 update for some reason but otherwise I love the program and use it on my phone and other computers running other OS's too!
summary: Love the program - won't launch after update to the Snap

description: It's seems good but just basic options are free!
This is surely the mother of all note taking apps - and an array of extensions that seemlessly integrate with the app.
summary: Best note taking app i've ever used - superb extensions

description: Installed, then removed. I don't object to paying for special features or for a great product. But after installing it almost every selection I made seem to either request a monthly fee for the feature or give me an add for the paid features. I understand that premium features may require $$ but indicate that somewhere in the menus either by greying them out or asterisking them with a notaitin that thos are premium features.
Click on the icon and no response
no way for this kind of app. #privacy
please add ability to import notes from notion.so for example.
Every useful tool is in a 5 years pay-for-month plan. Why didn't you just sell the application?
This app has everything I could want from customization to compatibility. Accessing your notes anywhere and knowing they are safe is more than I can ask for. Try it out, you won't regret it.
Can't register, because e-mail input field seems broken - can't enter anything into it. Other fields in same registration form are fine.
If you want a secure place to put your text, Standard Notes is a great option. Encyrpted by default, with simple UI that lets you write without getting in your way.

Easy to use
extended edition is nice (and not overpriced)
snap works well
Very good, for phone and laptop and syncs between...
this is perfect.
We need Flatpak support.. Snap opens too slow. I mean very slow like 30 seconds or sth and this is a new hardware

Looking at google keep and onenote replacement. 

Don't like the privacy issues with this- would rather pay to buy and host it myself. at $10usd a month its very pricey for what it is.
summary: needs access to your other passwords

description: I've used it and it works great for me even when I have not used such an application before plus even on being a snap it launches fast for about under 10 sec [ 1.8 GiB RAM ] and is really responsive !
been using this for years, love the markdown editor.
Paid for simple bold? Thank you

This is amazing for secure note taking but lacks some pretty basic features which you may feel after shifting from evernote or other apps. Will love to use it if they provide some of the features for free too.
summary: Amazing app for secure note taking

description:
I just want somewhere to type some words down, organise them, and have them backed up on the cloud. This does that with the least amount of fuss out of all the note taking apps I've tried.

I actually prefer the super simple text editor in the free version. I don't want to bother with formatting my text, I just want to write words down.

If you want something backed up in cloud and encrypted then available on what ever device you're packing -- android, ipad, linux, mac, window -- this is a solid choice from my perspective. Paid version is sending encrypted daily backups to Protonmail. Works as promised.
Open Source, Encrypted, Fast, Quite Simple

Important feature missing: "Find in Note", which means, not only find a note with a specific text, as already availabe, but also find a specific text *within a note*. Mere color highlight good but not enough, specially in case of long notes.
for some reason I can not open this software at all.

This small app will have you amazed at is complete cross platorm functuality with noted security measures that will have you install it on every device you have, it updates almost immediatly from the cloud with functions that will have you in awe that it is free

Monthly subscriptions only to write notes. That's crazy!
Why not just let people buy the app and use it forever?
Advertised several places as with "MarkDown support". Well yes. If you pay a monthly subscription. With the OSS version, it's barely a minimal notes taking app. Stay away.
Awesome, syncs with the phone app too.
summary: Awesome, syncs with the phone app too

description: Best and rich of features. I installed it on my all devices and keep all important data in it.
Encrypted notes, great features, awesome!
on a restart it asks for access to my password manager, when I try click the buttons,nothing happens and Standard Notes will not start anymore.
Provides great security and encryption (E2E / zero knowldege).
simple fast and reliable!!
Works like a charm. Lots of features. Encryption. Open-Source. Just great app.
An app with the right choice of core values with a lot of features, I've been waiting for such things for a long time.
Beatiful Design, Simple Usage, Online Backup Support.
Very easy to use. Encrypted. Can link with every device.

Pick an axis that matters, this app will excel.

* Super responsive team. Small personal-scale company but not so tiny that it's flaky. 
* Constant improvement, continued over the long term.
* Multiplatform apps work well. I'm on OS X, Ubuntu, Android, browser. Android was the weak one for a long time, but they got it together this year.
* Simple, focused UX. Does one thing well.
* Reliable
* Fast
* Cheap
installed stable version 3.161.0 using snap on 22.04 lts but it doesn't work! this supposed to be a better note taking app since you can pay and subscribe! very disappointed!

I love(d) this app. Until the latest "update." Now it does not launch at all. Uninstalled, reinstalled, etc. - clearly a major bug and the github page pretty much acknowledges that this is a known issue with no fix. This was a fantastic app and now it is useless until/unless the developers figure out how to, ya know, make the app actually open. VERY happy I did not pay for a subscription and even if they get this thing working again, I will be hestitant to rely on it for anything.

Standard Notes dos note run in ubuntu 23.04
Pleas fix it.
Thanks
summary: Standard Notes dos note run in ubuntu 23.04

description: The snap has stopped working. I installed it on 22.04 and it does not launch. When I try to launch it via terminal, I see errors.
It was all good, and after one update the Snap is not working on Ubuntu 22.04, it simply won't start and errors pop up when running via terminal
summary: Was good, suddenly not working on 22.04

description: The snap has stopped working. I installed it on 23.04 and it does not launch. I tried so many this but still its not opening.
The Standard Notes Snap version is finally starting/opening on Ubuntu 22.04.
It is very simple to use and can be synchronized with your phone or other computers. Very happy with it
I personally use Obsidian, but I think this app would be great as default Ubuntu Note-taking app
Good application and paid version give you access to awesome features. I used it for work for weeks.
This application is very good. And this app works great on ubuntu 22.04. I highly recommend it
Works everywhere, encrypted, plugs in are great, and works everywhere I need it to. The most reliable service I have ever paid for.
Works

Nach kurzem Test doch sehr enttäuscht, da die Suchfunktion mangelhaft ist. 

Die Suche selbst geht zwar flott, ABER es werden nur die Stellen markiert und man kann nicht wie bei PDF-Viewern von Fundstelle zu Fundstelle springen, sondern muss mühselig den ganzen Text nach Markierungen manuell durchscrollen und übersieht dabei leicht die eine oder andere Fundstelle...

Sehr schade, denn ansonsten wäre die kostenlose plattformunabhängige und verschlüsselbare Notiz-App sicher sehr gut, ist für mich aber leider unbrauchbar...
summary: Suchfunktion zwar schnell aber ziemlich nutzlos

description: Al principio dudaba, pero con el tiempo me he dado cuenta de que esta es una de las mejores (por no decir la mejor) aplicacion de notas.
all the features are paying features
summary: all the features are paying features

description: No la pude poner en español, pero los conceptos son simples, así que al final la aprendí a usar rapidito en inglés. Permite crear notas facilmente en un estilo similar a OneNote, o sea, por cuadernos. Puedes ponerle contraseñas a las carpetas que quieras. Totalmente recomendable.
la instale solo por probar pero me henamoro su minimalismo y su simplesa de uso pero super completo

La versión gratuita funciona muy bien y tiene herramientas que otras no tienen. No se si la versión pro pueda decepcionar a quien haga un uso profesional de la aplicación, pero para uso doméstico y personal, es perfecta.
Great note taking app. Premium is expensive but very much worth it. Nice to have a desktop client, even though it's just electron.
Cette App est disponible sur Linux, Windows, macOS, Android et je crois même sur iOS, elle permet donc une véritable synchronisation de ses notes. C'est une super alternative à Google Keep.

не понял можно ли вообще делать напоминалки (чтобы сами выскакивали в нужное вемя)
не очень то быстро стартует
простое приложение с неперегруженным функционалом и, главное, кросплатформенное с прекрасной синхронизацией
На Ubuntu 22 приложение так и не загрузилось
Само удалилось на kubuntu 22 + удалило все заметки

很好,非常像evernote,推荐使用
中文輸入完全沒問題，而且支持很多OS
安装了下，界面语言不带中文，可以中文输入。还不如装QOwnNotes
summary: 支持很多种语言界面，但就是没有中文

description: 应用还不错，不过我还是更喜欢Joplin
